short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Introducing Nexitab. Personalize your new tab page, sync seamlessly across devices, and elevate your productivity.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
---Features---
○ Custom Blocks: Organize your favorite sites into custom blocks for easy access.
○ Import & Export: Seamlessly transfer your custom blocks and settings across different accounts and devices.
○ Quick Add: Add new sites to your custom blocks directly from any webpage using our convenient pop-up extension.
○ Light and Dark Mode: Choose between light mode for those who enjoy feeling like they're staring into the sun or dark mode for those who have seen the light...and want to preserve their retinas.
○ Drag & Drop: Easily reorder your custom blocks by dragging and dropping them into your desired order.

---Coming soon---
○ Customizable settings
○ Pagination for smoother navigation

Don't forget to leave a review if you enjoy using Nexitab! Your feedback helps us improve. Have suggestions or feature requests? We'd love to hear from you! Leave your feedback in the reviews or contact us directly. Thank you for your support!
